description:
Aspose.Pdf for .NET is a PDF document creation and manipulation component that enables your .NET applications to read, write and manipulate existing PDF documents without using Adobe Acrobat. It also allows you to create forms and manage form fields embedded in a PDF document. This component is written in managed C# and it allows developers to add PDF creation and manipulation functionality to their Microsoft .NET applications (WinForms, ASP.NET and .NET Compact Framework).
        Aspose.Pdf for .NET is affordable and offers an incredible wealth of features including PDF compression options; table creation and manipulation; support for graph objects; extensive hyperlink functionality; extended security controls; custom font handling; integration with data sources; add or remove bookmarks; create table of contents; add, update, delete attachments and annotations; import or export PDF form data; add, replace or remove text and images; split, concatenate, extract or inset pages; transform pages to image; print PDF documents and much more.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:

Features
PDFNET-38548	Support feature to calculate Table Cell width
PDFNET-40994	To find table width
PDFNET-39606	Movie is not embedded inside PDF file
PDFNET-41491    PDF to PDF/A-2u - Support this conversion format

Enhancements
PDFNET-42230	Setting Footnote Text color
PDFNET-41905	Support of TextState in HtmlFragment

Bugs
PDFNET-41665	When color PDF is converted to grayscale, the text stays in color while the picture is black-white.
PDFNET-41664	When PDF is converted to TIFF, the output file has black boxes.
PDFNET-42078	When PDF converted to PDF_A_1B, the first page is missing a picture.
PDFNET-38406	PDF to PDFA1b: compliance failure due to CMYK error
PDFNET-41041	PDF to PDF/A - white image background overlaps background image
PDFNET-41256	PCL to PDF: incorrect output is generated
PDFNET-41281	Incorrect ColorType information is being returned
PDFNET-42030	Pdf file is not compilant with PDF/A-1a format (transparency and missing objects)
PDFNET-41693	PDF to PDF/A - Conversion process takes too much time
PDFNET-41694	PDF to PDF/A - Resultant file is too large
PDFNET-36341	Page color is being detected BlackandWhite instead RGB
PDFNET-39257	RgbToDeviceGrayConversionStrategy convert RGB to black and white instead grayscale
PDFNET-42146	Hyperlink is not working in FloatingBox
PDFNET-41987	Character's size issue when rendering pdf into html
PDFNET-42024	Line Spacing Increased on Multiline Textbox
PDFNET-41684	Latest Aspose.Pdf don't show correct ImagePlacement.Rotation
PDFNET-41125	PDF to PDF/A - Missing contents and formatting issues
PDFNET-41349	PDF to DOCX: TOC alignment issue
PDFNET-42091	When PDF is converted to PDF_A_1B, output file is still PDF.
PDFNET-42085	When PDF is converted to PDF_A_1B, output file is still classic PDF.
PDFNET-42122	Conversion Pdf to Pdfa - output not compliant
PDFNET-41371	When PDF is converted to HTML, produced HTML looks bad and some letters are stretched.
PDFNET-39289	PDF to JPEG - Some symbols look like different in resultant file
PDFNET-41995	Additional characters (curly braces) when converting XPS to PDF
PDFNET-38566	PDF to HTML - Color filling isn't displayed for some objects
PDFNET-39740	XFA form is not being converted to Standard Acro Form.
PDFNET-42113	PDF to DOCX - Resultant text appears to be in Russian
PDFNET-42283    PDF to PDF/A - Resultant file gets corrupted
summary: Aspose.Pdf for .NET is an amazing component which provides the feature to create and manipulate PDF documents.
title: Aspose.Pdf for .NET
